tool_description: This api gives you all of the lol esports leagues , vods, tournaments, match , game , event details with videos , scheadule , standings, teams and their players. And live game score.
name: League Of Legends Esports
title: League Of Legends Esports

api_list.name: Get Tournaments For League
api_list.description: This endpoint can gives you all of the tournaments for league id. You can get all league id from the Get Leagues endpoint . If you want you can get all tournaments data without filtering leagues.

api_list.name: Get Vods
api_list.description: In this api method you can get all previous event , match game information. You can search by tournaments id and you can get this value from the Get Tournaments For League endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Game
api_list.description: In this api method you can search all of the game data with game id. You can get this id from the Get Vods api method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com/game/107458367241215654"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com/game/{gameid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Live
api_list.description: In this method you can get all live events score

api_list.name: Get Schedule
api_list.description: In this method you can get all schedule for the leagues. You can filter multiple leagueId with join %  seperator.

api_list.name: Get Teams And Players
api_list.description: You can get all teams and player this api methods also you can filtered by team id or name.

api_list.name: Get Statics
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you champion statics. This statics can filtered time period and league.

optional_parameters.name: tier
optional_parameters.description:
You can filtered league name for example ;
Iron, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Master, Grandmaster, Challenger

api_list.name: Get Standings
api_list.description: In this api method you can get all standings for tournaments. You can get tournaments id Get Tournaments From League method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com/standings/103556720421148036"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com/standings/{tournamentid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-esports.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Event Detail
api_list.description: In this api method you can get all of the event detail from the match or event id (exactly same those ids.) you can get this id from the Get Vods or Get Match api methods.

api_list.name: Get Leagues
api_list.description: This api method can gives you all of the leagues and region information
